mapper.select: SELECT coalesce(MAX(loan_id),0) AS id FROM tblloan
SELECT decrement_id, value, sts, txt FROM tbldecrement_type WHERE sts != '9' ORDER BY value

SELECT l.loan_id , l.loaner_id , l.user_id , l.start_date , l.count_day , l.total_money , l.rate , l.type_payment , l."time" , l.decrement , l.type_money , l.sts , l.txt , l.modify_date , l.modify_by , l.action , u.full_name FROM tblloan l, tbluser u WHERE 1=1 and l.user_id=u.user_id
and l.loan_id = cast(#{loan_id} as int)
and l.loaner_id = cast(#{loaner_id} as int)
AND l.sts != '9' ORDER BY l.loan_id

select A.loaner_id , A.loaner_name , A.gender , A.phone , A.id_card , A.address , B.loan_id , B.start_date , B.total_money , B.rate , B.type_money , B.time , B.decrement , (select C.columns from tblrate_type C where C.type = cast(B.type_payment as int) group by C.columns) as type_payment_num , B.txt , B.count_day , B.loan_id , U.full_name from tblloaner A,tblloan B,tbluser u where A.sts != '9' AND B.sts != '9' And B.loan_id = (select min(loan_id) from tblloan WHERE loaner_id = cast(#{loaner_id} as int)) And A.loaner_id = cast(#{loaner_id} as int) AND u.user_id = B.user_id

SELECT columns , day , type
FROM tblrate_type WHERE sts != '9' group by columns,day,type

SELECT payment_id , loan_id , payment_date , prak_derm , total_rate , total_left , txt , modify_date , modify_by , (select full_name from tbluser u where u.user_id = l.modify_by) as pay_date , action , note FROM tblloan_payment l WHERE loan_id = cast(#{loan_id} as int) order by payment_id

select loan_id , tl.loaner_id , start_date , total_money , rate , time , decrement , tl.txt , count_day , (select max(payment_date) from tblloan_payment lp where lp.loan_id=tl.loan_id and lp.txt='9') as end_date , (select (sum(prak_derm)+ sum(total_rate)) from tblloan_payment lp where lp.loan_id=tl.loan_id and lp.txt='9') as amount
from tblloan tl inner join tblloaner tln on tln.loaner_id=tl.loaner_id where tl.sts != '9'
AND ( cast(loan_id as varchar) like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' or cast(total_money as varchar) like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' or tln.loaner_name like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' )
AND start_date >= #{startDate} AND start_date <= #{endDate}
AND type_payment = #{typePayment}
AND decrement = 0
AND decrement > 0
order by start_date desc limit cast(#{perPage} as int) offset cast(#{start} as int)

select A.loaner_id , A.loaner_name , A.gender , A.phone , A.id_card , A.address , B.loan_id , B.start_date , B.total_money , B.rate , B.type_money , B.time , B.decrement , B.type_payment , B.txt , B.count_day , B.loan_id , U.full_name , (select C.columns from tblrate_type C where C.type = cast(B.type_payment as int) group by C.columns) as type_payment_num from tblloaner A,tblloan B,tbluser u where A.sts != '9' AND B.sts != '9' And B.loan_id = cast(#{loan_id} as int) And A.loaner_id = cast(#{loaner_id} as int) AND u.user_id = B.user_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tblloan_payment WHERE loan_id =cast( #{loan_id} as int)
mapper.select: SELECT loan_id , loaner_id , user_id , start_date , total_money , rate , type_payment , "time" , decrement , type_money , sts , txt , modify_date , modify_by ,action FROM tblloan WHERE loan_id= cast(#{loan_id} as int) and sts != '9'

SELECT ln.loaner_id ,ln.loaner_name ,ll.loan_id , (select sum(prak_derm + total_rate) from tblloan_payment lp where lp.loan_id=ll.loan_id and lp.txt = '1' and payment_date <= to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYYMMDD') ) as total_money , (select min(payment_date) from tblloan_payment lp where lp.loan_id=ll.loan_id and lp.txt = '1' and payment_date <= to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYYMMDD') ) as payment_date , (select DATE_PART('day', to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYYMMDD')::timestamp - min(payment_date)::timestamp) from tblloan_payment lp where lp.loan_id=ll.loan_id and lp.txt = '1' and payment_date <= to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYYMMDD') ) as count_day FROM tblloan ll, tblloaner ln, tblloan_payment tlp WHERE ll.loaner_id = ln.loaner_id and tlp.loan_id=ll.loan_id AND tlp.txt = '1' AND payment_date <= to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ll.sts != '9' AND ln.sts != '9'
AND (cast(ll.loan_id as varchar) = #{search} OR ln.loaner_name like '%'|| #{search} || '%' )
GROUP BY ll.loan_id,ln.loaner_id,ln.loaner_name order by count_day desc
SELECT COUNT(*) as countTT FROM tblloan_payment WHERE txt = '1' AND loan_id = CAST(#{loan_id} AS int)
SELECT COUNT(*) as countTT FROM tblloan_payment WHERE txt = '9' AND loan_id = CAST(#{loan_id} AS int)
